question: Aritz Aduriz, who recently announced his retirement, is associated with which sports?
explanation:
Aritz Aduriz, the famous striker of the Athletic Bilbao club, has recently announced his retirement from football after a two-decade long career.
He has taken this decision to retire as he needed a hip replacement to perform as an athlete in the future. Athletic Club, also commonly known as Athletic Bilbao, is a Spanish professional football club. At present, he is the sixth-highest scorer of the club with 172 goals. He was a member of Spain team at the 2016 European Championship.
